flights_list_instruction1: Click a flight to display details.
flights_list_instruction2: Click a flight for 2 seconds to remove it.
flights_list_instruction3: Use 'Go Back' button to return to the main page.
flights_list_instruction4: Use 'ADD FLIGHT' button to add a new flight.
add_flight_instruction1: Click a field to insert data.
add_flight_instruction2: Make sure to fill all the fields.
add_flight_instruction3: Use 'Go Back' button to abort and return to the previous page.
add_flight_instruction4: Use 'ADD FLIGHT' button to add a new flight and return to the previous page.
delete_flight_conf: Are you sure you want to delete this fligth?
select_details: Select a flight to see details
remove_flight_conf: Are you sure you want to remove this flight?
